strapiPost.title: Live! @ Turnbow Concert Series Continues In Downtown Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Itâ€™s the last Thursday of the month, meaning the Live! @ Turnbow Concert Series will continue this evening in Downtown Springdale with music, food and drink in the Outdoor Dining District, and lots of fun!

  • Performers: The opening act tonight is The Mountain Gypsies, an acoustic family band from the Boston Mountains. The headliner tonight is Arkansauce, a genre-hopping four-piece string band from Northwest Arkansas, bending the rules and blurring the lines between an array of sounds like bluegrass and folk with notes of country, blues, and funk.
  • More to come: Live! @ Turnbow will take place on the last Thursdays of the month through October this year. All concerts begin at 6:30p, and in the event of inclement weather, postponed concerts are rescheduled to the following Sunday at 6:30p. 

Learn more HERE.
